section.title: Scott Penrose
section.p: Scott Penrose is a private glider owner and club memeber at Gliding Club of Victoria in Australia. He has recently purchased a Cobra SZD 36a
Scott is an experienced open source and web developer combining many languages from C, Perl, XSL to client side CSS, Javascript and more.
Scott is the project manager of XCSoar, help develop parts of the code, especially user input and configuraton, and maintain the web site.
You can see me my site here http://linux.dd.com.au/
